The Lazy Dragonfly v1.00

Craft file: Lazy Dragonfly v100.craft

The Lazy Dragonfly is a glider built entirely w/ KSP 0.24 stock parts. It has a 'cruising' speed of 3 m/s, a glide slope on the order of 1000:1, and does not require active stabilization (SAS, reactions wheels and control surfaces may all be turned off). When drop-released from a few meters height at the head of the spaceplane runway, the LD will gracefully glide down the runway and reach the coast in about 20 min with plenty of altitude to head out to sea.
